text:
[CSS issue]
Hi everyone, I am trying to finish the practicium of the CMS for Developer course on the academy. On the footer part, I can't set the background color of the menu, as the children of the menu are overflowing from my pink menu-container.
Do you have any idea on  how to completely wrap the menu with a container ?

Thanks for your help
ypu already have one url for i can review??
